name: Content Novelty
description: Tests the model's ability to generate novel and unexpected content and approaches in presentations

prompts.text: Create a presentation that draws unexpected connections between artificial intelligence and ancient philosophy. Explore novel parallels, surprising historical precedents, and thought-provoking comparisons that audience members would not have considered before. The presentation should challenge conventional thinking about both AI and philosophy.

Create a presentation about climate change that frames the issue in a completely novel way that might change how people think about it. Avoid the standard apocalyptic or purely scientific framings. Develop a fresh perspective that could break through audience fatigue on this topic.
expected_elements: Unconventional framing of a familiar topic
Fresh approach to a well-covered subject
Unexpected entry points to the topic
